thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us
thread.title: CW
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by CW

author: CW
title: CW
text: The woman that was attempting to help me was rude and very condescending of any questions I had. I was told it would be delivered that day but I had to pay in cash and $75. If I hadn't been sleeping on the floor for the last few days I would have put up a fight. I was refused a receipt when I asked for one from the delivery guy who was a salesman at the store who had just thrown the mattress and boxspring on top of his Jeep Cherokee.
